Entry.JapaneseText: そう言えば、海で見つけた宝箱に入ってた 昔の地図、どうした？
Entry.EnglishText: That reminds me, what happened to that ancient map we got from the treasure chest we dredged up from the sea?

Entry.JapaneseText: あ……持ってますよ。 でも暗号が難しくって……
Entry.EnglishText: Ah, I have it here. But the code is hard to crack...

Entry.JapaneseText: 時間があったら解いてみるさ。 頭の運動にはちょうどいい。
Entry.EnglishText: We can try figuring it out when we have the time. It would be a good mental exercise.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだこりゃ…… さっぱりわかんねえぜ？
Entry.EnglishText: What is this? I can't wrap my head around it at all!

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたは考えなくていいから。 宝を引き揚げる時にがんばりなさい。
Entry.EnglishText: You don't need to think. Just do your best when we salvage the treasure chests.
